function_call.name: classify_risks
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Coronavirus persistence on surfaces and materials","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variation in coronavirus persistence based on temperature and humidity","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Effectiveness of biocidal agents in inactivating coronaviruses","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Person-to-person transmission of coronavirus in hospital and family settings.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contaminated dry surfaces serving as a potential source of coronavirus transmission.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient understanding of coronavirus persistence on inanimate surfaces.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of proper ventilation in green housing may lead to the propagation of contagious diseases.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poor construction practices in prefabricated dwellings may lead to the accumulation of harmful microbes and contagions.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Fragmented research on the interaction between covid-19, housing policies, and green housing may lead to incomplete understanding of the components.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate consideration of micro-level building and macro-level city, country aspects of green housing during and after the covid-19 era may result in ineffective housing policies.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of emphasis on crisis-response measures, support for tenants and owners, and recovery strategies in housing policies may increase the risk of disease propagation and affect resident wellbeing.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of understanding of how buildings affect health in the context of a pandemic","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertainties caused by the covid-19 pandemic leading to a lack of pragmatic instructions to reduce indoor risks","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Need for revision of building codes and certification processes to address specific pandemic-related needs","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases in the built environment due to inadequate building hygiene and wellbeing.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate indoor environment leading to poor air quality and health issues.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Human behavior and lifestyle affecting the spread of contagious diseases within the built environment.","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of appropriate home environments for at-home work during covid-19","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate management of infrastructural and technical facilities","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insufficient adaptation of facilities management in response to covid-19","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased risk of disease transmission in crowded living spaces due to pandemic restrictions.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate access to green spaces and outdoor environments in housing designs.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited research on the relationship between green housing and covid-19","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Interactions between covid-19, housing policies, and resident behaviors influence green housing requirements","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited evidence on the impact of green housing in the context of covid-19 pandemic","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of comprehensive coverage of all affected countries in the literature review","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of investigation into the impact of housing policies on green housing and resident wellbeing during covid-19","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insufficient analysis of the impact of green buildings, interest groups, and covid-19 on the built environment","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Shift in homebuyer preferences and housing locations due to covid-19 could lead to spread of contagious diseases in new residential areas.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential for increased density in urban areas due to the need for affordable housing. this could lead to higher risk of contagious disease transmission.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conversion of office spaces in city centers to residential units could lead to changes in population density and potential disease exposure.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Shortages of affordable housing for low-income people and families","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decrease in road traffic flows and major cities experiencing drops in rush-hour traffic congestion","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased investment in energy efficiency and retrofitting of buildings","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of infection in cities due to close contact in vulnerable households, construction sites, and local businesses.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on digital platforms for cultural resources, municipal services, and participation may lead to increased virtual interactions and dependence.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential long-term coexistence with covid-19 leading to ongoing public health concerns and the need for sustainable recovery strategies.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Vulnerable groups such as the elderly, women, the poor, and migrants disproportionately affected by pandemic","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shift towards digital life and remote work","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Changing trust in local authorities","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Covid-19 crisis-response measures may discourage expansion and maintenance of housing stock, leading to barriers restricting mobility and impacting financial and economic resilience.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Customized policy responses to covid-19 are important based on the local situation and the needs of local people.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Cities may suffer different consequences of the health crisis, impacting their recovery options and possibilities based on their trade openness, labor market structure, and industrial composition.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Temporary suspension of evictions in multiple countries","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Mortgage and rent payment suspensions in multiple countries","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Support measures for construction industry and utility bill payment","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Spread of contagious diseases due to lack of social distancing","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Economic costs to businesses and people due to social distancing measures","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shift in living preferences leading to depopulation of large cities","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of green and sustainable construction in the housing industry","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"}]}
